issue.title: Parallel specialized memory algorithms should require forward iterators

discussion.p: The parallel versions of uninitialized_{copy,move}{,_n} are currently depicted as accepting input iterators for their source range. Similar to the non-uninitialized versions, they should require the source range to be at least forward.
Set status to Tentatively Ready after six votes in favour during reflector poll.
discussion.note: 2021-06-07 Approved at June 2021 virtual plenary. Status changed: Voting → WP.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4885.
